name: Skate Bird - The Adventure of a Flappy Tiny Bird
name_original: Skate Bird - The Adventure of a Flappy Tiny Bird
description:
You may still be too young to fly but, fortunately, you have a Hoverboard with which you can take to the air as you never dreamed.

Touch the screen to make the little bird fly, avoid the obstacles you will find along the way and move ahead to score the most points and challenge your friends.

If you are an unconditional Arcade games fan and you like pixels, you will not want to miss Skate Bird. It will fascinate you...

Tremendously addictive, challenging and fun!

FEATURES:
• Simple "one touch" based control.
• Pixelart style graphics.
• Music + SFX.
• Integrated with Game Center. Compete online to get the highest score and challenge your friends to beat you.
• Designed for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.
